jrmds.model

Class Rule

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrmds.model.Component
      • jrmds.model.SubComponent
        • jrmds.model.Rule
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Concept, Constraint

    public abstract class Rule
extends SubComponent
    This class is a container for concepts and constraints.

      • setSeverity

        public void setSeverity(java.lang.String sev)
        Sets the severity of the current Rule.
        Overrides:
        setSeverity in class Component
        Parameters:
        sev - The severity which is used to overwrite the current severity.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if the String sev is null.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the String sev doesn't match any of the acceptable severitiy options.
